description: Reeborg can start in any location in the world,
and your job is to return Reeborg to the bottom left
corner of the world (1, 1). Note that Reeborg can be
facing in any direction at the start of the program.
After returning Reeborg to the bottom left corner, you
need to build a ramp of stars, which could be of any length.
The star ramp will always be the same slope (two across and
one up), and will end whenever it would go outside the walls.
